sentences.text: NOTICE OF THE 2017 ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To Stockholders of AutoNation, Inc.:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders of AutoNation, Inc. will be held at AutoNations Headquarters, located at 200 SW 1st Ave, Fort Lauderdale, Florida 33301, on Wednesday, April 19, 2017, at 8:00 a.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time for the following purposes as more fully described in the proxy statement:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) To elect the ten director nominees named in the proxy statement, each for a term expiring at the next Annual Meeting of Stockholders or until their successors are duly elected and qualified;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) To ratify the selection of KPMG LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (3) To hold an advisory vote on executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (4) To hold an advisory vote on the frequency of the advisory vote on executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (5) To approve the AutoNation, Inc. 2017 Employee Equity and Incentive Plan; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (6) To transact such other business as may properly come before the Annual Meeting or any adjournments or postponements of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only stockholders of record as of the close of business on February 21, 2017, the record date, are entitled to receive notice of the Annual Meeting and to vote at the Annual Meeting or any adjournments or postponements of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We cordially invite you to attend the Annual Meeting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the Annual Meeting, we ask that you please cast your vote as soon as possible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy and reclaim your right to vote at any time prior to its use.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy statement includes information on what you will need to attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Order of the Board of Directors,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Jonathan P. Ferrando Executive Vice President - General Counsel, Corporate Development and Human Resources
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 6, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: INTERNET AVAILABILITY OF PROXY MATERIALS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), we are furnishing our proxy materials, including this proxy statement and our annual report, to our stockholders primarily via the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On March 6, 2017, we began mailing to most of our stockholders a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (the Notice) that contains instructions on how to access our proxy materials on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice also contains instructions on how to vote via the Internet or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other stockholders, in accordance with their prior requests, received an email with instructions on how to access our proxy materials and vote via the Internet, or have been mailed paper copies of our proxy materials and a proxy card or voting form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may request to receive all future proxy materials in printed form by mail or electronically by email by following the instructions contained in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Important Notice Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials for the Stockholder Meeting to be Held on April 19, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2016 Annual Report and this proxy statement are available at www.edocumentview.com/an.

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement contains information relating to the solicitation of proxies by the Board of Directors (the Board) of AutoNation, Inc. (AutoNation or the Company) for use at our 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders or any adjournment or postponement thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Annual Meeting will be held at AutoNations Headquarters, located at 200 SW 1st Ave, Fort Lauderdale, Florida 33301, on Wednesday, April 19, 2017, at 8:00 a.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only stockholders of record as of the close of business on February 21, 2017 (the record date) are entitled to receive notice of the Annual Meeting and to vote at the Annual Meeting or any adjournments or postponements of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the record date, there were 100,920,153 shares of AutoNation common stock issued and outstanding and entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We made copies of this proxy statement available to our stockholders beginning on or about March 6, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: INFORMATION ABOUT THE ANNUAL MEETING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Meeting Proposals
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal Matter Board Vote Recommen 1 Election of Directors FOR EACH NOMINE 2 Ratification of the Selection of KPMG LLP as Independent Auditor for 2017 FOR 3 Advisory Vote on Executive Compensation FOR 4 Advisory Vote on Frequency of the Advisory Vote on Executive Compensation 3 YEARS 5 Approval of the AutoNation, Inc. 2017 Employee Equity and Incentive Plan FOR
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting Matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The holders of at least 50,460,077 shares (a majority of shares outstanding on the record date) must be present in person or represented by proxy to conduct business at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both abstentions and broker non-votes will be counted for he purpose of determining the presence of a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting by Stockholders of Record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record (your shares are registered directly in your name with our transfer agent), you may vote by proxy via the Internet by following the instructions provided in the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you receive printed copies of the proxy materials by mail, you may also vote by proxy via the Internet, by telephone, or by mail by following the instructions provided on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders of record who attend the Annual Meeting may vote in person by obtaining a ballot from the inspector of elections.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting by Beneficial Owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares (your shares are held in the name of a brokerage firm, bank, or other nominee), you may vote by proxy by following the instructions provided in the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, vote instruction form, or other materials provided to you by the brokerage firm, bank, or other nominee that holds your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not provide specific voting instructions to the nominee that holds your shares, such nominee will have the authority to vote your shares only with respect to the ratification of the selection of KPMG LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm (such proposal is considered a routine matter under NYSE rules), and your shares will not be voted and will be considered broker non-votes with respect to the other proposals (such proposals are considered non-routine matters under NYSE rules).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To vote in person at the Annual Meeting, you must obtain a legal proxy from the brokerage firm, bank, or other nominee that holds your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Changing Your Vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy and change your vote at any time before the final vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote again on a later date via the Internet or by telephone (only your latest Internet or telephone proxy submitted prior to the meeting will be counted), by signing and returning a new proxy card with a later date, or by attending the Annual Meeting and voting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your attendance at the Annual Meeting will not automatically revoke your proxy unless you vote again at the Annual Meeting or specifically request in writing that your prior proxy be revoked.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Votes Required to Adopt Proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share of our common stock outstanding on the record date is entitled to one vote on each of the ten director nominees and one vote on each other matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be elected, directors must receive a majority of the votes cast (the number of shares voted for a director nominee must exceed the number of votes cast against that nominee).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of Proposals 2, 3, and 5 requires the affirmative vote of a majority of the shares of common stock present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Proposal 4, the option receiving the highest number of votes will be deemed to be the preferred frequency of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effect of Abstentions and Broker Non-Votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the election of directors, broker non-votes (shares held by brokers that do not have discretionary authority to vote on a proposal and have not received voting instructions from their clients) and abstentions will not be counted as having been voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Proposals 2, 3, and 5, abstentions will be counted as present and entitled to vote and will have the same effect as negative votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Proposal 4, abstentions will not be counted in determining the preferred frequency for future advisory votes on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Proposals 3, 4, and 5, broker non-votes will not be counted as present and entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brokers will have discretionary authority to vote on Proposal 2 since it is considered a routine matter under NYSE rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting Instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you complete and submit a proxy with voting instructions, the persons named as proxies will follow your instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record and submit a proxy without voting instructions, or if your instructions are unclear, the persons named as proxies will vote as the Board recommends on each proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to any other matters properly presented at the Annual Meeting, the persons named as proxies will vote as recommended by our Board of Directors, or if no recommendation is given, in their own discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Solicitation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will pay for the cost of soliciting proxies, and we have retained Innisfree M&A Incorporated to assist with the solicitation of proxies for an estimated fee of $15,000 plus reimbursement for expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our directors, officers, and other employees, without additional compensation, may solicit proxies personally or in writing, by telephone, email, or otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As is customary, we will reimburse brokerage firms, banks, and other nominees for forwarding our proxy materials to each beneficial owner of common stock held of record by them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attending the Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are entitled to attend the Annual Meeting only if you were an AutoNation stockholder as of the record date or you hold a valid proxy for the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may be asked to present valid photo identification and proof of stock ownership as of the record date to be admitted to the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directions to the Annual Meeting are provided under Directions to the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders of AutoNation, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the recommendation of the Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee, the Board has nominated the ten persons listed below to stand for election for a new term expiring at the 2018 Annual Meeting of Stockholders or until their successors are duly elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Items To Be Voted On - Proposal 1: Election of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the nominees for director were elected by our stockholders at our 2016 Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board consists of a diverse group of leaders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Many of our directors have experience serving as executive officers or on boards and board committees of major companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Many of our directors also have extensive corporate finance and investment banking experience as well as a broad understanding of capital markets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our directors have a strong owner orientation - approximately 20% of our common stock is held by our directors or entities or persons related to our directors (as of February 21, 2017).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The median age and tenure of our Board nominees are 55.5 and 6.5 years, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have set forth below information regarding each director nominated to stand for election, including the specific experience, qualifications, attributes, or skills that led the Board to conclude that such person should serve as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee and the Board believe that the experience, qualifications, attributes, and skills of our directors provide the Company with the ability to address the evolving needs of the Company and represent the best interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominee Current Position with AutoNation Age Director Since Mike Jackson Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer 68 1999 Rick L. Burdick Director 65 1991 Tomago Collins Director 45 2014 David B. Edelson Director 57 2008 Karen C. Francis Director 54 2016 Robert R. Grusky Director 59 2006 Kaveh Khosrowshahi Director 49 2015 Michael Larson Director 57 2010 G. Mike Mikan Director 45 2013 Alison H. Rosenthal Director 40 2011
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mike Jackson has served as our Chief Executive Officer and Director since September 1999 and as our Chairman of the Board since January 2003.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also served as our President from February 2015 until January 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From October 1998 until September 1999, Mr. Jackson served as Chief Executive Officer of Mercedes-Benz USA, LLC, a North American operating unit of DaimlerChrysler AG, a multinational automotive manufacturing company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From April 1997 until September 1999, Mr. Jackson also served as President of Mercedes-Benz USA.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From July 1990 until March 1997, Mr. Jackson served in various capacities at Mercedes- Benz USA, including as Executive Vice President immediately prior to his appointment as President of Mercedes-Benz USA.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Jackson was also the managing partner from March 1979 to July 1990 of Euro Motorcars of Bethesda, Maryland, a regional group tha owned and operated eleven automotive dealership franchises, including Mercedes-Benz and other brands of automobiles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In January 2014, Mr. Jackson was appointed to the Board of Directors of the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta, after previously serving on the Board of Directors of the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlantas Miami Branch.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since 2015, he has served as the Deputy Chair of the Board of Directors of the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Jacksons automotive experience, his position as our Chief Executive Officer, and his broad knowledge of our Company and the automotive industry led the Board to conclude that he should serve as one of our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rick L. Burdick has served as one of our directors since May 1991.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since 1988, Mr. Burdick has been a partner in Akin, Gump, Strauss, Hauer & Feld, L.L.P., a global full service law firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Burdick is managing partner (international) and chair of the global energy practice of the firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also serves as Lead Director of CBIZ, Inc. (formerly, Century Business Services, Inc.), a provider of outsourced business services to small and medium-sized companies in the United States.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Burdicks experience as a senior partner at a large law firm advising large companies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: on a broad range of corporate transactions and on securities law and corporate governance matters led the Board to conclude that he should serve as one of our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tomago Collins has served as one of our directors since October 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since July 2012, Mr. Collins has served as Vice President, Communications of Kroenke Sports & Entertainment (Kroenke), which owns and operates a multi-billion dollar portfolio of real estate, sports franchises, and cable networks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Collins has served in various positions at Kroenke since August 2003, including as Vice President, Media from November 2010 until July 2012 and as Vice President, Media & Player Development from October 2008 until November 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Collins serves as a director of Republic Services, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Collins business development, strategic planning, and public affairs experience, as well as his public company board experience, led the Board to conclude that he should serve as one of our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: David B. Edelson has served as one of our directors since July 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Edelson is Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Loews Corporation, a diversified holding company with subsidiaries in the property-casualty insurance, offshore drilling, natural gas transmission and storage, and lodging industries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He joined Loews as a Senior Vice President in May 2005 and became its Chief Financial Officer in May 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Loews, Mr. Edelson was Executive Vice President & Corporate Treasurer of JPMorgan Chase & Co.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He was named Corporate Treasurer in April 2001 and promoted to Executive Vice President in February 2003.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Edelson spent the first 15 years of his career as an investment banker, first with Goldman, Sachs & Co. and subsequently with JPMorgan Chase & Co.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Edelsons experience as a senior executive officer of a large holding company owning a wide range of businesses, as well as his prior experience as an investment banker and corporate treasurer, led the Board to conclude that he should serve as one of our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Karen C. Francis has served as one of our directors since February 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Francis is Executive Chairman of AcademixDirect, Inc., a technology marketing company serving the education industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Francis served as Executive Chairman and CEO of AcademixDirect, Inc. from 2009 to 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 2004 to 2007, Ms. Francis was Chairman and CEO of Publicis & Hal Riney, an advertising agency based in San Francisco.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 2001 to 2002, she served as Vice President of Ford Motor Company, where she was responsible for global technology strategies, customer relationship management, global export operations, and Ford Direct, the companys online sales initiative structured as a joint venture with Ford dealers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 1996 to 2000, Ms. Francis held several positions with General Motors, including serving as Regional Manager of the Chevrolet division responsible for all dealer operations in eleven states, as well as General Manager of the Oldsmobile division overseeing dealership operations nationwide.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Francis also serves as a director of The Hanover Insurance Group, Inc. and Telenav, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Francis leadership, marketing, technology, and automotive experience and her prior public company board experience led the Board to conclude that she should serve as one of our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Robert R. Grusky has served as one of our directors since June 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2000, Mr. Grusky founded Hope Capital Management, LLC, an investment management firm for which he serves as Managing Member.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He co-founded New Mountain Capital, LLC, a private equity and public equity investment management firm, in 2000 and was a Principal, Managing Director and Member of New Mountain Capital from 2000 to 2005 and has been a Senior Advisor since then.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 1998 to 2000, Mr. Grusky served as President of RSL Investments Corporation, the primary investment vehicle for the Hon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ronald S. Lauder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior thereto, Mr. Grusky served in a variety of capacities at Goldman, Sachs & Co. in its Mergers & Acquisitions Department and Principal Investment Area.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Grusky is a director of Strayer Education, Inc., an education services company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From August 2008 until December 2012, he served as a director of AutoZone, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Gruskys board experience and experience in investment management, private equity, and investment banking led the Board to conclude that he should serve as one of our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kaveh Khosrowshahi has served as one of our directors since October 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since 2002, Mr. Khosrowshahi has served as a Partner and Managing Director of Allen & Company LLC, an investment bank, and as co-head of Allen & Company LLCs Capital Markets Group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Khosrowshahis investment and finance experience led the Board to conclude that he should serve as one of our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Michael Larson has served as one of our directors since February 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Larson serves as chief investment officer for William H. Gates III, a position he has held since 1994.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is responsible for Mr. Gates non-Microsoft investments as well as the investments of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation Trust.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He serves as a director of Republic Services, Inc., Ecolab Inc., and Fomento Economico Mexicano, S.A.B. de C.V. In addition, he is Chairman of the Board of Trustees of two funds within the Western Asset Management fund complex.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From April 2009 through December 2014, he served as a director of Grupo Televisa, S.A.B. Mr. Larsons investment and business experience and broad
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: understanding of the capital markets, business cycles, and capital investment and allocation led the Board to conclude that he should serve as one of our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: G. Mike Mikan has served as one of our directors since March 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Mikan has served as Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of SHOT-ROCK CAPITAL, LLC, a private investment capital group, since January 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From January 2013 until December 2014, he served as President of ESL Investments, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Mikan served as the Interim Chief Executive Officer of Best Buy Co., Inc. from April 2012 until September 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From November 1998 through February 2012, he served in various executive positions at UnitedHealth Group Incorporated, including as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer and as Chief Executive Officer of UnitedHealths Optum subsidiary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Mikan serves as a director of Princeton Private Investment Fund.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He served as a director of Best Buy from April 2008 until December 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Mikans operational and public company leadership experience and his broad understanding of capital investment and allocation led the Board to conclude that he should serve as one of our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Alison H. Rosenthal has served as one of our directors since March 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since September 2014, she has served as Vice President Strategic Partnerships at Wealthfront, Inc., an automated investment service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From July 2013 until August 2014, Ms. Rosenthal served as Chief Operating Officer of MessageMe, a company that developed and offered a multimedia messaging application for mobile devices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She served as Executive in Residence at Greylock Partners, a leading venture capital firm, from December 2011 until July 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From February 2006 until January 2011, Ms. Rosenthal led various initiatives in the Business Development Department at Facebook, Inc., where she served as Senior Manager from February 2006 until July 2008 and as Head of the Global Operator Program, Mobile from July 2008 until January 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Rosenthal served as an associate at General Atlantic Partners, LLC, a global private equity fund focused on IT, from February 2001 until June 2003 and as an analyst at Goldman, Sachs & Co. from July 1998 until July 2000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Rosenthals technology experience, including in the areas of mobile applications and social media, and investment and finance experience led the Board to conclude that she should serve as one of our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Guidelines and Codes of Ethics
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board is committed to sound corporate governance principles and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Boards core principles of corporate governance are set forth in the AutoNation, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Guidelines (the Guidelines), which were adopted by the Board in March 2003 and most recently amended as of January 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Guidelines serve as a framework within which our Board conducts its operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee of our Board is charged with reviewing annually, or more frequently as appropriate, the Guidelines and recommending to our Board appropriate changes in light of applicable laws and regulations, the governance standards identified by leading governance authorities, and our Companys evolving needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to clearly set forth our commitment to conduct our operations in accordance with our high standards of business ethics and applicable laws and regulations, we have a company-wide Business Ethics Program, which includes a Code of Business Ethics applicable to all of our employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also maintain a 24-hour Alert-Line for employees to report any Company policy violations under our Business Ethics Program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our Board has adopted the Code of Ethics for Senior Officers and the Code of Business Ethics for the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These codes comply with NYSE listing standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of the Guidelines and the codes referenced above are available on our corporate website at investors.autonation.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You also may obtain a printed copy of the Guidelines by sending a written request to: Investor Relations, AutoNation, Inc., 200 SW 1s Ave, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33301.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In December 2016, the Board amended and restated our bylaws to implement proxy access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our bylaws permit a stockholder, or a group of up to 20 stockholders, who has owned 3% or more of our common stock for at least three years to nominate and include in our proxy materials director candidates representing up to the greater of two individuals or 20% of the Board, provided the stockholder(s) and the nominee(s) satisfy the requirements and conditions specified in our bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Stockholder Proposals and Nominations for the 2018 Annual Meeting below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority Voting with Resignation Policy for Uncontested Director Elections.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Guidelines provide that an incumbent director who fails to receive a majority vote in an uncontested election shall tender his or her written resignation to the Chairman of the Board for consideration by the Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our Guidelines, if our Chairman of the Board is not an independent director, the independent directors shall annually select one of the independent directors to serve as the lead independent director with specified responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Role of the Board and Board Structure below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recoupment Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In February 2015, the Board adopted the AutoNation, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Policy Regarding Recoupment of Certain Incentive Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the policy, if a covered officer engages in fraud, intentional misconduct, or gross negligence, and as a result, we are required to restate our financial statements due to material noncompliance with any financial reporting requirement, then we may require reimbursement or forfeiture of all or a portion of any excess incentive compensation paid to or received by such officer, during the three-year period preceding the date on which we are required to prepare the restatement, that would not have been paid or received under the specific terms of the applicable incentive award had the financial results been originally reported as set forth in the restatement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Compensation Discussion and Analysis - Policy Regarding Recoupment of Certain Incentive Compensation below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership Guidelines; Holding Requirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our non-employee directors and executive officers are subject to robust stock ownership guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In January 2017, the Board amended our executive stock ownership guidelines to provide that a covered executive is expected to retain 50% of any shares of our common stock, net of applicable tax withholding and the payment of any exercise or purchase price (if applicable), he or she receives upon the vesting or settlement of any equity awards or the exercise of any employee stock options, until the applicable threshold under the guidelines is met.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Board Compensation - Director Stock Ownership Guidelines and Compensation Discussion and Analysis - Executive Stock Ownership Guidelines below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Role of the Board and Board Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our business and affairs are managed under the direction of our Board, which is the Companys ultimate decision-making body, except with respect to those matters reserved to our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Boards mission is to maximize long-term stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board establishes our overall corporate policies, selects and evaluates our senior management team, who is charged with the conduct of our business, and acts as an advisor and counselor to senior management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board also oversees our business strategy and planning, as well as the performance of management in executing our business strategy, assessing and managing risks, and managing our day-to-day operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board reviews and approves the Companys long-term strategic plan developed by management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board also reviews managements ongoing and long-term plans for capital allocation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Boards oversight of our business strategy and planning and management of our day-to-day operations includes a review of risks that could impact our goals, objectives, and financial condition.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our Audit, Compensation, Corporate Governance and Nominating, and Finance committees assist the Board in overseeing our management of risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee reviews with management significant financial and cyber risks as well as our process for assessing and managing risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee reviews and approves our executive compensation program and also reviews the general compensation structure for our corporate and key field employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee oversees our company-wide Business Ethics Program, which includes a Code of Business Ethics applicable to all of our employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Finance Committee is responsible for reviewing and making recommendations to the Board with respect to our capital structure and our capital allocation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: strategy, as well as financial risk management strategies and policies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While our Board oversees our management of risk as outlined above, management is responsible for identifying and managing risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The positions of Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer (CEO) are both currently held by Mike Jackson.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that this leadership model is currently appropriate for the following reasons:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Guidelines provide for the selection of a Lead Independent Director whenever the Chairman of the Board is not an independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our independent directors meet in regularly scheduled executive sessions led by our Lead Independent Director without management present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board is stockholder-oriented and focused on the best interests of our stockholders (approximately 20% of our common stock is held by our directors or entities or persons related to our directors (as of February 21, 2017)), a significant portion of our directors compensation is equity-based, and the Board has established strong director stock ownership guidelines requiring each non-employee director to hold shares of our common stock having a fair market value of not less than $750,000 as discussed below under Board Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has adopted strong and effective corporate governance policies and procedures to promote the effective and independent governance of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Corporate Governance Guidelines and Codes of Ethics and Corporate Governance Highlights above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The combined role enables decisive leadership, ensures clear accountability, and fosters alignment on corporate strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our independent directors annually review the performance of our Chairman and CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that it functions well with its current leadership structure and with Mr. Jackson as Chairman of the Board and Michael Larson as our Lead Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At our 2009, 2010, 2012, 2014, and 2016 Annual Meetings of Stockholders, stockholder proposals to amend our bylaws to require an independent Board chairman were presented, and 86%, 85%, 84%, 72%, and 76% of the votes cast, respectively, voted against such proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we believe that the current leadership structure of the Board supports its risk oversight functions by providing independent leadership at the committee level, executive sessions of the Board of Directors, and ultimate oversight by the full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In May 2016, our Board re-elected Mr. Larson as our Lead Independent Director in accordance with our Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Independent Directors duties include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: calling and presiding at executive sessions of the non-management Directors and at meetings of the Board at which the Chairman is not present, and communicating feedback from such sessions and meetings to the Chairman and the CEO;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: serving as a liaison between the non-management Directors, the Chairman and the CEO, and/or senior management (as applicable);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing and advising on Board meeting agendas, schedules, and materials;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: working with the Chairman and the CEO to approve the scope, quality, quantity, and timeliness of information sent to th Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: being available for communication with major stockholders, in coordination with the Chairman and the CEO; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: performing such other duties as the Board may from time to time delegate
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In performing the duties described above, the Lead Independent Director is expected to consult with the chairs of the appropriate Board committees and solicit their participation in order to avoid diluting the authority or responsibilities of such committee chairs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board held 13 meetings and took one action by unanimous written consent during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, each person serving as a director attended at least 75% of the total number of meetings of our Board and any Board committee on which he or she served (held during the period for which such person has been a director).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our independent directors held four executive sessions without management present during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our directors are expected to attend our Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any director who is unable to attend our Annual Meeting is expected to notify the Chairman of the Board in advance of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except for Robert J. Brown, who did not stand for re-election to the Board, each person who was then serving as a director attended the 2016 Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Committees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has established four separately designated standing committees to assist the Board in discharging its responsibilities: the Audit Committee, the Compensation Committee, the Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee, and the Finance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The charters for our Board committees are in compliance with applicable SEC rules and NYSE listing standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These charters are available at investors.autonation.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may obtain a printed copy of any of these charters by sending a request to: Investor Relations, AutoNation, Inc., 200 SW 1st Ave, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33301.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following table sets forth the current membership of each of our Boards committees:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Name Audit Committee Compensation Committee Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee Finance Committee Rick L. Burdick    Chair   Tomago Collins        David B. Edelson       Karen C. Francis        Robert R. Grusky Chair       Kaveh Khosrowshahi        Michael Larson*   Chair    G. Mike Mikan     Chair Alison H. Rosenthal
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: * Lead Independent Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee primarily assists our Board in fulfilling its oversight responsibilities by reviewing our financial reporting and audit processes and our systems of internal control over financial reporting and disclosure controls.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among the Committees core responsibilities are the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) overseeing the integrity of our financial statements, for which management is responsible, and reviewing and approving the scope of the annual audit;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) selecting, retaining, compensating, overseeing, and evaluating our independent registered public accounting firm;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) reviewing the Companys critical accounting policies;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) reviewing the Companys quarterly and annual financial statements prior to the filing of such statements with the SEC;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) preparing the Audit Committee report for inclusion in our proxy statement; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vi) reviewing with management significant financial risks or exposures and assessing the steps management has taken to minimize, monitor, and control such risks or exposures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For a complete description of our Audit Committees responsibilities, please refer to the Audit Committees charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that each Audit Committee member has the requisite independence and other qualifications for audit committee membership under SEC rules, NYSE listing standards, the Audit Committees charter, and the independence standards set forth in the Guidelines (as discussed below under Director Independence).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has also determined that each of Mr. Grusky and Mr. Edelson is an audit committee financial expert within the meaning of Item 407(d)(5) of Regulation S-K under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the Exchange Act).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Directors above for a description of the business experience of each of Mr. Grusky and Mr. Edelson.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee held six meetings and took one action by unanimous written consent during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee Report for fiscal 2016, which contains a description of the Audit Committees responsibilities and its
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: recommendation with respect to our audited consolidated financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2016, is set forth below under Audit Committee Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee primarily assists our Board in fulfilling its compensation oversight responsibilities by, among other things:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) reviewing our director compensation program and suggesting changes in director compensation to the Board, if appropriate;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) reviewing and approving the compensation of our CEO and other senior executive officers and setting annual and long-term performance goals for these individuals;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) reviewing and approving the compensation of all of our corporate officers;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) reviewing the Companys program for management development and succession planning;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) reviewing and approving performance- based compensation of executive officers as contemplated under Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the Code), including incentive awards and stock-based awards; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vi) administering our equity compensation plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the Compensation Committees charter, the Compensation Committee may form subcommittees and may delegate t such subcommittees any or all power and authority of the Compensation Committee as the Compensation Committee deems appropriate, provided that no subcommittee may consist of fewer than two members, and provided further that the Compensation Committee may not delegate to a subcommittee any power or authority required by any applicable laws, regulations, or listing standards to be exercised by the Compensation Committee as a whole.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee reviews executive compensation at its meetings throughout the year and sets executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee also reviews director compensation annually and recommends to the full Board the compensation for non-employee directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our CEO reviews the performance of other named executive officers and makes recommendations, if any, to the Compensation Committee with respect to compensation adjustments for such officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Compensation Committee determines in its sole discretion whether to make any adjustments to the compensation paid to such executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since 2013, the Compensation Committee has engaged Pearl Meyer (PM), an independent compensation consulting firm, to provide research and analysis and to make recommendations as to the form and amount of executive and director compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee sought input from PM on executive and director compensation matters for 2016, including the design and competitive positioning of our executive and director compensation programs, our peer group, appropriate compensation levels, and evolving compensation trends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the Compensation Committee considered input from PM, the Compensation Committees decisions reflect many factors and considerations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PM does not provide any other services to the Company or its subsidiaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee assessed the independence of PM pursuant to SEC and NYSE rules and concluded that no conflict of interest exists that would prevent PM from serving as an independent consultant to the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee reviews the appointment of its independent compensation consulting firm annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of the review process, the Compensation Committee considers the independence of the firm in accordance with applicable SEC and NYSE rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For more information on the responsibilities and activities of the Compensation Committee, including the Committees processes for determining executive compensation, see Executive Compensation below, as well as the Compensation Committees charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that each Compensation Committee member has the requisite independence for Compensation Committee membership under NYSE listing standards and the independence standards set forth in the Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has also determined that each Compensation Committee member qualifies as a non-employee director within the meaning of Rule 16b-3 under the Exchange Act and as an outside director under Section 162(m) of the Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee held five meetings and took one action by unanimous written consent during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee assists our Board in fulfilling its oversight responsibilities by performing the following duties: (i) reviewing annually, or more frequently as appropriate, the corporate governance principles and practices set forth in the Guidelines, in comparison to the governance standards identified by leading
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: governance authorities and our evolving needs, and making recommendations to the Board with respect to any appropriate amendment to the Guidelines;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) considering and advising the Board with respect to other corporate governance issues;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) periodically reviewing our codes of ethics and conduct for directors, officers, and employees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) leading annual evaluations of Board and Board committee performance;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) assessing periodically our Boards needs in terms of skills and qualifications and recommending to our Board candidates for nomination and election to our Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vi) reviewing Board candidates recommended by our stockholders; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vii) recommending to our Board assignments to committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that each Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee member is independent under NYSE listing standards and the independence standards set forth in the Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee held five meetings and took no actions by unanimous written consent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee has a policy with regard to the consideration of director candidates recommended by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For information regarding this policy, refer to Stockholder Communications - Stockholder Director Recommendations below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Finance Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The duties and responsibilities of the Finance Committee include reviewing and, where appropriate, making recommendations to the Board with respect to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the Companys capital structure and any material changes thereto, including potential issuances of debt or equity securities;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the Companys capital allocation strategy, processes and plans, including the Companys cost of capital;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) share repurchase programs and debt repurchases;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) financial risk management strategies and policies, including hedging and the use of derivatives; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) the Companys short-term investment policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that each Finance Committee member is independent under NYSE listing standards and the independence standards set forth in the Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Finance Committee held seven meetings and took no actions by unanimous written consent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our Guidelines, our Board must consist of a substantial majority of directors who qualify as independent directors under the listing standards of the NYSE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be considered independent:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: our Board must affirmatively determine that a director has no material relationship with the Company (either directly or as a partner, stockholder, or officer of an organization that has a relationship with the Company); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a director must not have a disqualifying relationship, as set forth in the NYSE listing standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To assist the Board in determining whether a director is independent, our Board has established director independence standards, which are part of our Guidelines available at investors.autonation.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our director independence standards, none of our non- employee directors has a material relationship with the Company that impairs his or her independence, and our Board has affirmatively determined that all of our directors, except Mr. Jackson, our Chairman and CEO, are independent under our director independence standards and the listing standards of the NYSE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also determined that Mr. Brown, who served as a director for part of 2016, was independent under our director independence standards and the listing standards of the NYSE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to our independence standards, the directors who serve on our Audit Committee each satisfy standards established by the SEC providing that to qualify as independent for the purposes of membership on that committee, members of audit committees may not:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: accept directly or indirectly any consulting, advisory, or other compensatory fee from the Company or any of its subsidiaries other than their director compensation, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: be an affiliated person of the Company or any of its subsidiaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the listing standards of the NYSE, in affirmatively determining the independence of each director who serves on our Compensation Committee, our Board also considered all factors specifically relevant to determining whether each such director has a relationship to the Company which is material to his or her ability to be
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: independent from management in connection with the duties of a compensation committee member, including, but not limited to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the source of compensation of each such director, including any consulting, advisory, or other compensatory fee paid b the Company to him or her, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: whether he or she is affiliated with the Company, a subsidiary of the Company, or an affiliate of a subsidiary of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Selection Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee is responsible for identifying, evaluating, and recommending candidates to the Board for nomination and election to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee is also responsible for assessing the appropriate balance of skills and characteristics required of our Board members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee considers candidates suggested by its members and other Board members, as well as management and stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the Guidelines, candidates, including candidates recommended by stockholders, are selected on the basis of, among other things, broad experience, financial expertise, wisdom, integrity, ability to make independent analytical inquiries, understanding of our business environment, the candidates ownership interest in the Company, and willingness and ability to devote adequate time to Board duties, all in the context of assessing the needs of our Board at that point in time and with the objective of ensuring diversity in the background, experience, and viewpoints of our Board members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Guidelines provide that the number of directors should permit diversity of experience without hindering effective discussion, diminishing individual accountability, or exceeding a number that can function efficiently as a body.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board periodically reviews the size of the Board to determine the size that will be most effective for the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board completes an annual self-evaluation, which includes a self-assessment questionnaire for each Board member.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The self-assessment questionnaire addresses topics such as the structure of the Board, the skills and backgrounds of the current directors, the size of the Board, and the Boards committee structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the Audit Committee, the Compensation Committee, the Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee, and the Finance Committee also completes an annual self-evaluation, which includes a self- assessment questionnaire tailored specifically for such committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Candidates recommended by our stockholders are considered on the same basis as if such candidates were recommended by one of our Board members or other persons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Stockholder Communications - Stockholder Director Recommendations below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain Relationships and Related Party Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has adopted a written policy which requires that transactions with related parties must be entered into in good faith on fair and reasonable terms that are no less favorable to us than those that would be available in a comparable transaction in arms-length dealings with an unrelated third party.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board, by a vote of the disinterested directors, must approve all related party transactions valued over $500,000, while our Audit Committee must approve all related party transactions valued between $100,000 and $500,000 and review with management all other related party transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under SEC rules, a related party is defined as any director, executive officer, nominee for director, or greater than 5% stockholder of the Company, and their immediate family members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since the beginning of 2016, the Company has not participated in any related party transaction in which any related party had or will have a direct or indirect material interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our non-employee director compensation program is designed to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ensure alignment with long-term stockholder interests;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ensure we can attract and retain outstanding directors who meet the criteria outlined under Director Selection Process above; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: recognize the time commitments necessary to oversee the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the Board, advised by PM and based on a review of market data, adjusted our non-employee director compensation rogram.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective as of January 1, 2016, the Board:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: eliminated the annual committee retainers previously paid to non-Chair members of the Boards committees; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: modified the non-employee director annual equity award to provide for an annual award of restricted stock units based on a fixed dollar value of $250,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, in 2016, our non-employee director compensation program consisted of the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: annual Board retainer of $50,000 for each non-employee director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: annual retainer of $25,000 for the Lead Independent Director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: annual committee retainers of $20,000 for the Chair of the Audit Committee and $10,000 for the Chair of each of the Compensation, Corporate Governance and Nominating, and Finance Committees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: annual award of restricted stock units based on a fixed dollar value of $250,000 as described further below; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: expense reimbursement in connection with Board and committee meeting attendance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On January 4, 2016, each of our non-employee directors then serving received a grant of 4,259 (calculated by dividing $250,000 by the closing price of our common stock on the grant date) vested restricted stock units (RSUs) under the AutoNation, Inc. 2014 Non-Employee Director Equity Plan (the 2014 Director Plan), which was approved by our stockholders at our 2014 Annual Meeting of Stockholders held on May 6, 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder Director Recommendations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee has established a policy pursuant to which it considers director candidates recommended by our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All director candidates recommended by our stockholders are considered for selection to the Board on the same basis as if such candidates were recommended by one or more of our directors or other persons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To recommend a director candidate for consideration by our Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee, a stockholder must submit the recommendation in writing to our Corporate Secretary not later than 120 calendar days prior to the anniversary date of our proxy statement distributed to our stockholders in connection with our previous years annual meeting of stockholders, and the recommendation must provide the following information:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the name of the stockholder making the recommendation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the name of the candidate;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the candidates resume or a listing of his or her qualifications to be a director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) the proposed candidates written consent to being named as a nominee and to serving as one of our directors if elected; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) a description of all relationships, arrangements, or understandings, if any, between the proposed candidate and the recommending stockholder and between the proposed candidate and us so that the candidates independence may be assessed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The stockholder or the director candidate also must provide any additional information requested by our Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee to assist the Committee in appropriately evaluating the candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
